sections.title: APPENDIX F : MUC-4 SYSTEM WALKTHROUGH EXAMPL E 1 . INSTRUCTION S
paragraphs: The walkthrough should give the audience a fairly in-depth understanding o f your system's processing strategy . To maximize the clarity of the presentation and t o facilitate understanding of cross-system similarities and differences, all presentor s are asked to focus on the processing of a single, common example, TST2-MUC4-0048 . The walkthrough should be based on the text of that message and the templates tha t your system produces for that message .
Describe how the EVALUATION SYSTEM processed this message . It is important to document how the system used in the evaluation actually processed this message and to show these results . \t

This provides insight into how your system obtained it s particular evaluation results . Once you have run this message on the evaluatio n system, you can debug the system and show an additional "debugged" output, but yo u must report clearly on any changes made after the evaluation . TST2-MUC4-0048 Walkthrough Issues ("S" =" Sentence" )
S l : SALVADORAN PRESIDENT-ELECT ALFREDO CRISTIANI CONDEMNED THE TERRORIS T
KILLING OF ATTORNEY GENERAL ROBERTO GARCIA ALVARADO AND ACCUSED THE

FARABUNDO MARTI NATIONAL LIBERATION FRONT (FMLN) OF THE CRIME . Describe the processing, with particular attention to : *the basic clause level processing for each of the two clause s *the processing of the conjunctio n *the verbs "CONDEMNED" and "ACCUSED" and the embedded sentence s under them : are the embedded sentences taken as facts, as beliefs ? *resolution of the phrase "THE CRIME" *whether/how these are merged into a single template .
S11-13 : GUERRILLAS ATTACKED MERINO'S HOME IN SAN SALVADOR 5 DAYS AGO WIT H
EXPLOSIVES . THERE WERE SEVEN CHILDREN, INCLUDING FOUR OF THE VIC E
PRESIDENT'S CHILDREN, IN THE HOME AT THE TIME. A 15-YEAR-OLD NIECE OF MERINO' S

WAS INJURED . Describe the processing, focusing on discourse issues : *how is this incident NOT merged with the incident in S I *how does the system represent "7 CHILDREN, INCLUDING FOUR . . . " how many children get counted? *can it determine that people IN the home are targets? how ?
S21-22 : ACCORDING TO THE POLICE AND GARCIA ALVARADO'S DRIVER, WHO ESCAPED
UNSCATHED, THE ATTORNEY GENERAL WAS TRAVELING WITH TWO BODYGUARDS . ONE

OF THEM WAS INJURED. Describe the processing for these sentences, in particular : *how is this incident merged with the incident in S l ? *how is the pronoun "ONE" resolved in S22 ? *how does this get merged into the human target slots ? F-1

sections.title: 2 . TEXT OF TST2-MUC4-004 8
paragraphs: TST2-MUC4-004 8

SAN SALVADOR, 19 APR 89 (ACAN-EFE) -- [TEXT] SALVADORAN PRESIDENT-ELECT ALFRED O CRISTIANI CONDEMNED THE TERRORIST KILLING OF ATTORNEY GENERAL ROBERTO GARCI A ALVARADO AND ACCUSED THE FARABUNDO MARTI NATIONAL LIBERATION FRONT (FMLN) O F THE CRIME . LEGISLATIVE ASSEMBLY PRESIDENT RICARDO VALDIVIESO AND VICE PRESIDENT-ELEC T FRANCISCO MERINO ALSO DECLARED THAT THE DEATH OF THE ATTORNEY GENERAL WA S CAUSED BY WHAT VALDIVIESO TERMED THE GUERRILLAS' "IRRATIONAL VIOLENCE . " GARCIA ALVARADO, 56, WAS KILLED WHEN A BOMB PLACED BY URBAN GUERRILLAS ON HIS VEHICLE EXPLODED AS IT CAME TO A HALT AT AN INTERSECTION IN DOWNTOWN SA N SALVADOR .

"WE HAVE TO CONDEMN THIS INCIDENT, IT IS A GUERRILLA ACT," ALFREDO CRISTIANI , NATIONALIST REPUBLICAN ALLIANCE (ARENA) PRESIDENT-ELECT, WHO WILL REPLAC E CHRISTIAN DEMOCRAT JOSE NAPOLEON DUARTE ON 1 JUNE, STATED . [1 short paragraph omitted] ACCORDING TO CRISTIANI, THE ATTACK TOOK PLACE BECAUSE ATTORNEY GENERAL GARCIA ALVARADO WARNED THAT "HE WOULD TAKE MEASURES AGAINST URBAN TERRORISTS . " VICE PRESIDENT-ELECT FRANCISCO MERINO SAID THAT WHEN THE ATTORNEY GENERAL'S CAR STOPPED AT A LIGHT ON A STREET IN DOWNTOWN SAN SALVADOR, AN INDIVIDUAL PLACED A BOMB ON THE ROOF OF THE ARMORED VEHICLE . "THE DRIVER TOLD THE ATTORNEY GENERAL ABOUT THE BOMB . THE VEHICLE SWERVED AND THE BOMB EXPLODED, CAUSING THE TOP OF THE VEHICLE TO COLLAPSE ON THE ATTORNE Y GENERAL'S HEAD," MERINO STATED .

GUERRILLAS ATTACKED MERINO'S HOME IN SAN SALVADOR 5 DAYS AGO WITH EXPLOSIVES . THERE WERE SEVEN CHILDREN, INCLUDING FOUR OF THE VICE PRESIDENT'S CHILDREN, IN THE HOME AT THE TIME. A 15-YEAR-OLD NIECE OF MERINO'S WAS INJURED . [4 short paragraphs omitted ] RICARDO VALDIVIESO, PRESIDENT OF THE LEGISLATIVE ASSSEMBLY AND AN ARENA LEADER , SAID THE FMLN AND ITS "FRONT" GROUPS ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR THE "IRRATIONAL VIOLENC E THAT KILLED ATTORNEY GENERAL GARCIA ." [1 short paragraph omitted] ACCORDING TO THE POLICE AND GARCIA ALVARADO'S DRIVER, WHO ESCAPED UNSCATHED , THE ATTORNEY GENERAL WAS TRAVELING WITH TWO BODYGUARDS . ONE OF THEM WA S INJURED . THE ATTORNEY GENERAL'S BODY WAS DESTROYED BY THE BOMB THAT EXPLODED OVER HI S HEAD . NO GROUP HAS CLAIMED CREDIT FOR THE ATTACK YET, BUT POLICE SOURCES CLAIM IT "I S CHARAC;1'ERISTIC OF THE FMLN URBAN COMMANDOS ." [3 short paragraphs omitted ] Fâ€”2
